==Suit by SPPF==
==Suit by SPPF==

[[SociÃ©tÃ© civile des Producteurs de Phonogrammes en France]] is an umbrella group for a variety of organizations in France. In November, 2008, SPPF initiated a suit against Sourceforge.net, [[Vuze]], [[Limewire]], and [[Morpheus (computer program)|Morpheus]] for hosting P2P file-sharing application [[Shareaza]] that "facilitates mass copyright infringement".<ref>[http://torrentfreak.com/record-labels-to-sue-vuze-limewire-and-sourceforge-081114/ Record Labels to Sue Vuze, Limewire and SourceForge]</ref> SourceForge is not sued for hosting copyrighted material itself.
+
[[SociÃ©tÃ© civile des Producteurs de Phonogrammes en France]] is an umbrella group for a variety of organizations in France. In November, 2008, SPPF initiated a suit against Sourceforge.net, [[Vuze]], [[Limewire]], and [[Morpheus (computer program)|Morpheus]] for hosting P2P file-sharing application [[Shareaza]] that "facilitates mass copyright infringement".<ref>[http://torrentfreak.com/record-labels-to-sue-vuze-limewire-and-sourceforge-081114/ Record Labels to Sue Vuze, Limewire and SourceForge]</ref> SourceForge is not sued for hosting copyrighted material itself, but for hosting Vuze.
